description:
## Depricated
Over discussion on gitter, we have determined this package should be moved to vim-tux.install.

	    Used libraries: Perl 5.22.1, Python 2.7.11, Python 3.5.1, Racket 6.4.0.4, Ruby 2.2.3, [Lua 5.3.2](https://chocolatey.org/packages/lua53), Tcl 8.6.4, libXpm.
      
      You'll need to have the appropriate DLL files in your Vim directory or somewhere in your %PATH% to make them work. They're not included, but can easily installed with chocolatey (see eg. [Lua 5.3.2](https://chocolatey.org/packages/lua53) ).
      The list of compiled features is available [here](https://tuxproject.de/projects/vim/_versioninfo.php). 

## Thanks

 * Build provided by [TuxProject.de](https://tuxproject.de/projects/vim/) - consider [donating](https://tuxproject.de/#spenden) to help support their server costs.
 * A [vim-x64](https://chocolatey.org/packages/vim-x64) package was developed first by [LinkSatonaka](https://chocolatey.org/profiles/LinkSatonaka "Link Satonaka"). His work was forked on [github](https://github.com/mattia72/chocopkgs) to make x86 builds also available.
summary: 32bit build of vim, compiled with all features enabled. 'Right click > edit with vim' support included. Vim and gVim launchers are placed on the PATH
author: Build: TuxProject.de,  Developer: vim team
